channel.title: How would I do this?
channel.description: My sister always spends a SHITLOAD of time talking to a bunch of her bitch friends at school, they really are bitches. So she gets on the computer and spends hours emailing them bitches. I want to know how I could make the browser redirect to a page that says yahoo or google mail is under maintenance. Ive made the page, I just need to know the method of doing this.

item.title: How would I do this?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

yea, set your hosts file like this:

127.0.0.1 .com

will result in redireting all .com to localhost, just setup webserver on localhost then it will open that,
repeat for all .net, .org, .co.uk and other pre-fixs

Read full topic

item.title: How would I do this?
item.dc:creator: @thefalloffuckingtroy thefalloffuckingtroy.
item.description:
@thefalloffuckingtroy wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:3, topic:254368”]Ok, but before i help you i need to know a few things so i can help you faster and better.

I need to know your sisters: name,age,cup size and msn.
I will put this information into my script.
This way my script will recognize your sister and will immediatly go to the “under maintenance” page.[/quote]

Cup size is really important i guess, dood you should just change her password and then she’ll go around and bitch about how she got hacked.

Read full topic

This way my script will recognize your sister and will immediatly go to the “under maintenance” page.
